price: ߊ߲ ߓߊ߯ ߡߍ߲ ߛߌ߬ߡߊ߬ߦߊ߫ ߊ߲ ߘߴߏ ߞߎ߲߬ߕߐ߬ߡߊ߬ߛߊߦߌ߲߫ ߘߊ߲ߠߌ߲ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߴߏ߬ ߤߊߞߟߌߡߦߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߘߍ߫؟
arabic: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرۡهُ نُنَكِّسۡهُ فِي ٱلۡخَلۡقِۚ أَفَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waman nuʿammir'hu nunakkis'hu fī al-khalqi afalā yaʿqilūna
